title: Master a Language with Personalized Sentences!
description: Tailor your language learning with sentences that fit your life
dc:creator: Coupling
content:encoded:
Hey Cupheads!

I'm excited to drop the Sentences Update! With this update, you’ll find new sentence minigame exercises and a sentence breakdown view that shows you exactly what each part of a sentence means.

Forget textbook sentences like “Ella does not like apples” — with Coupling, your partner picks sentences that are personal to you and your life.

🧩 Introducing Sentence Exercises

🔀 Brand New Sentence Shuffle Minigame

Blend some new notes into your Grinds with the new Sentence Shuffle Minigame , featuring sentences handpicked and crafted by your partner.

Your job is to shuffle the sentence parts into the right order. You’ll get hints about what each part means, so you can focus on figuring out the structure. Parts are color-coded based on parts of speech to make it even easier.

My favorite part actually happens when I get these wrong! Coupling highlights mistakes: totally wrong parts turn red, and chunks that are partly right but misplaced get a yellow warning. This way, it’s easy to see where you slipped up. Plus, the correct pieces are saved, so you don’t have to start from scratch!

Coupling intelligently schedules sentence exercises only once you've got the

individual words down, ensuring a natural progression of learning; learn the

words, then learn the sentence!

❎ Learn Words in Context With Fill-in-the-Blanks

Coupling’s got your back with fill-in-the-blank exercises!

For example, if you're learning the word coffee, and you have a sentence "I drink coffee at the cafe", Coupling Cafe will generates an exercise "I drink `____` at the cafe" that challenges you to recall the word “coffee”.

These exercises are a perfect bridge between learning individual words and absorbing full sentences. While you can see the whole sentence, you're only tasked with filling in the individual word. This helps you familiarizing yourself with the words in their natural context, rather than memorizing them in isolation.

💝 Personalized Sentences

The sentences you receive aren’t random—they’re personalized to you and your learning journey, written by the one who knows you best: your partner. The fun part? Since your partner is writing them, each sentence becomes a surprise!

Unlike other language apps, your content is tied to things you care about: your hobbies, interests, and curiosities.

⚡ Hyper-Personalized Sentences with Cafe Membership

With a Café Membership, things get even better! Our AI helps your partner come up with sentences that incorporate words you’ve recently learned. It’s a super smart way to reinforce what you already know and make those new words feel like second nature.

By practicing sentences that incorporate words you know, you’ll experience a smoother progression. Each new sentence builds on what you’ve learned, allowing you to use and connect vocabulary in ways that reflect real-life communication. This smart, tailored approach is something no other app offers—it’s language learning that grows with you!

🛠️ Breakdowns: Understanding Sentences, Word by Word

Ever get taught a sentence and think, Wait, what do all these words mean? With Sentence Breakdowns, that confusion is gone. Coupling automatically breaks down each sentence into smaller parts, explaining what each word or phrase means. You’ll see how everything fits together, piece by piece.

Even better, you’ll know if you’ve already learned any of the words. If you’re missing any, just add them to your deck right from the breakdown! It’s like building your vocabulary while mastering real sentences.

🃏 Collect All the Words

Think of each sentence like a challenge—can you collect all the words? If you’re missing any, you can add them right from the Sentence Breakdown. The sentence won’t show up in minigames until you’ve learned the individual words, so you’re always progressing at the right pace. It’s a fun, organic way to learn—first the words, then the full sentence!

📋 Release Notes

A ton of bug fixes and improvements, here are the main ones:

  • Added Custom Specialty Brews, available with Cafe Membership

  • Added additional translations sources from OpenAI

  • Visual refreshes of many parts of the Coupling Cafe app

  • Continued speed improvements for a smoother experience

  • Allow edit of Brew vocabulary

  • Added ability to add sentences to your deck via the Add Card screen

  • Added warnings if you're potentially adding a duplicate word

  • Handle if the phone goes offline or server goes down

⁉️ What's Next: Chit Chats

What’s next after learning words and sentences? Conversations! I’m excited to start working on Chit Chats—conversation starters you’ll unlock after finishing a Brew. You and your partner will be able to chat using the language you’re learning, and you’ll get AI support to help you along the way.

With Chit Chats, you’ll practice speaking or writing complete thoughts with your partner's guidance, while having fun and learning more about each other. It’s another way to use what you’ve learned in real-life situations and build fluency naturally!

In designing Coupling, I’m always thinking about what would be the most fun and helpful for me—and hoping it helps all of you too! Some of you have given me amazing feedback, and I’m always eager to jump on it. Seriously, reach out and let me know your thoughts—I’m like your personal language app designer here!

Cheers!

Kevo from Coupling Cafe

title: What Coupling's Been Brewing for Six Months
description: Fresh New Ways to Language Together
dc:creator: Coupling
content:encoded:
Hello Cupheads! It's been half a year since Coupling's comeback on app stores. Thanks to your early support, I've been grinding hard for months to make Coupling stronger than ever before for you and your partner to Language Together. Read what's new!

☕ Grinds: A Supercharged Learning System

Learning is now easier and more efficient with Grinds—bite-sized chunks of 10 words that take less than 3 minutes each. Do a few Grinds to keep your streak going or keep going if you feel motivated. Complete all your Grinds and earn Streak Freeze or Streak Repair in the future!

🎮 New Interactive Exercises

Learning is now much more engaging with new interactive multiple-choice quizzes! Instead of immediately asking, “What does this mean?”, Coupling gently introduces new vocabulary with easy multiple-choice exercises.

After a few repetitions, words progress into traditional active recall exercises to really lock them into memory.

In the future, I’d love to add even more exercises like pronunciation tests, matching, or sentence-arranging mini-games.

🔡 Romanization Toggle

For languages like Chinese or Japanese, Coupling now lets you hide romanization to test your reading skills. Toggle it during Grinds to reveal pronunciation if needed. Zhuyin is now supported for Taiwanese Mandarin learners!

🎁 Delights: Loving Rewards

Gift a Delight to your partner. Delights are learning goals paired with real-life gifts based on the Five Love Languages: Words of Affirmation, Quality Time, Receiving Gifts, Acts of Service, and Physical Touch.

Discover what makes your partner feel most loved, then surprise and motivate them! You’ll be amazed at how regularly giving gifts of love can add a fun new layer to your bond.

I plan to expand Delights so you can provide them as “Tips” to your partner in return for fulfilling requests, and to include a “Love Language Quiz” to help you discover which gifts make your partner feel the most loved!

🏪 The Brew Store

Brews are word packs that you ask your partner to help you learn. Choose from over 500 Brews with almost 6000 words, categorized by topics, based on your life and interests! Don't be stuck on a linear fixed course; forge your own learning path.

👶 First Word Brews

Start with the absolute basics with First Word Brews, including words like hello, goodbye, thank you, numbers, or colors. These Brews are translated and vetted by committees of native speakers and are ready for immediate use. Your partner can still personalize them for you.

🚚 Brew Categories

Or explore deeper topics in categories such as Basics, Language Essentials, Verbs & Adjectives, Everyday Objects, Hobbies & Interests, Work & Education, Food & Drinks, Love & Family, Everyday Living & Health, or Holidays. Brews provide strong building blocks for your path to language mastery. Can you master all the Brews of a category?

🤖 AI-Powered Brew Creation

Fulfilling Brews is now easier and more intuitive. AI assistance pre-generates translations, audio, sentences, and icons. Partners can personalize content easily such as recording audio or creating relevant sentences, making the learning experience more relevant and engaging.

📰 Bulletin Board: Stay Connected

Stay connected with the new Bulletin Board, a special notifications screen to get real-time updates on your partner's progress and activities. The Coupling app now updates in realtime, ensuring you and your partner are always in sync. Previously, you may have had to refresh to app to see changes. No longer!

Baristas can now also manage learner requests through a new cute ticket order screen.

🎧 Natural and Realistic AI Audio

Enjoy clearer and more realistic audio with upgraded Wavenet and AI neural audio. Cards now feature engaging audio animations, and you can request audio recordings from your partner. Slow audio playback is also available to aid pronunciation.

🎖️ Reward Stamps

Reward Stamps are badges, but they aren't just for show. Earning a reward stamp nets you Beans so you're able to learn more words. Each new word added to your deck costs 1 Bean. Earn Beans by consistently Grinding or earning Reward Stamps

There're Reward Stamps for accomplishing a total number of Grinds, or extending a long learning Streak. I intend to add Reward Stamps for learning a number of related Brews to indicate subject mastery

💸 Support the Developer

You can also purchase Beans through the app to support me and the development of Coupling Cafe! It'd be greatly appreciated as I've been working on Coupling for years on my own without any external financial support.

⚡ Improved Onboarding

Getting started is smoother with redesigned login, onboarding, and tutorials! Everything is smoother and more streamlined for new cafe visitors.

We tailor the journey to you, asking your current level, setting a goal, and setting a daily reminder time that works for you. Speaking of daily reminders, Coupling is now smarter on how it sends you daily notifications, no longer sending them daily no matter what.

🐇 Performance Enhancements and Bug Fixes

Experience a smoother, faster Coupling with comprehensive performance and UX upgrades. Bugs, crashes, and confusing elements have been addressed since the Valentine’s Day release. There's just been countless enhancements that didn't make the cut for this post!

🗺️ What’s Next?

📦 Custom and Community Brews

Personalize your learning journey by creating Custom Brews tailored to your favorite topics—whether it’s words from a beloved TV show, a language textbook, or a memorable conversation. Plus, with Community Brews, you can share your creations and explore others’ unique packs, all while earning Beans to fuel your learning.

❓ Questions & Answers

Ask your partner or AI questions about a word, its contexts, or grammar! My philosophy is to use GPTs as an assistance feature in language learning, but without over-relying on it or overshadowing the power of learning together. Such as providing personalized sentence suggestions based on what you already know, or asking AI to create mnemonics or "memory tricks" to more easily remember words.

Thanks to all of those who have been using Coupling over the past half year and providing me with feedback and support.

Give Coupling another shot and please let me know what you think!

See you at the cafe,

Kevo

title: A Complete Tour of Coupling Cafe
description: A step-by-step guide to transform your language learning journey with your partner
dc:creator: Coupling
content:encoded:
👋 Hello from Coupling Cafe, where language learning transforms from a solo task into an adventure shared with your favorite person. Together, learning becomes powerful.

In case you missed it, an early public version of Coupling was released last week on App Store and Google Play!

Polished onboarding is still being built out so until we that gets set up, let this guide to be your comprehensive tour of the cafe.

💌 1. Invite Your Partner to The Cafe

🧑‍🤝‍🧑 By inviting your partner, you open the door to tailored vocabulary packs, personalized sentences, and high quality audio recordings. This is language learning, made-to-order just for you.

💪 By learning together, you're not just memorizing words on your own; you're building a shared language. This shared language becomes a secret code between you two, adding a new layer to your bond.

We make it super easy for partners to help, with an intuitive UI and an assistive AI. Once you're both at the cafe, we can create our first Brew.

🍵 2. Crafting Your First Brew

A Brew is a personalized vocabulary pack, a blend of words and phrases that matter to you and your partner. Complete with translation, personalized sentences, and even audio recordings.

🫘 Learner Orders a Brew

About half of you reading are the learning half of the duo. The first thing you should do is order a Brew from your Barista, meaning request your partner to build a vocabulary pack for you.

Select from hundreds of Brews on our shelves. You get to choose the content of your Brew based on your tastes and what's relevant to you. Find a Brew you like then place an order for your Brew

After you've ordered a Brew, you can further customize it by adding or removing words. This makes learning engaging as you're more likely to remember words that you actually care about.

Find a comfy table and wait for your Barista to call your name. In the meantime, we have a Starter Deck for you to sample. Most languages come with 50 or so basic essential words and phrases, ready to go.

💝 Barista Crafts the Brew

Now to the teaching Baristas out there, your role is pivotal. Once your customer has ordered a Brew, you'll get a notification and see their Brew order on the shelf. Tap on the Brew:

See all the words that your partner has requested to learn:

Tap on a word. You'll be guided through setting translations, making sentences, recording audio, and selecting images for each word—don't worry, our AI is here to assist you every step of the way.

💬 Select a Translation

Your main task is to provide a translation for each word, with AI-generated suggestions to help. You can also add notes for additional context:

🎙️ Record Audio

Recording your wonderful voice offers a clear, native pronunciation for your partner, significantly improving their listening and speaking skills. If you choose not to provide one, Coupling will fall back to text-to-speech audio. After recording, you can play it back, re-record, or continue on:

📰 Make a Sentence

Creating sentences provides context on how each word is used, turning basic vocabulary learning into a more immersive experience. These sentences will be used in fill-in-the-blank games, enhancing the learning process.

The AI offers basic suggestions. It's your chance to personalize a sentence just for your partner.

If it happens that the translated sentence you created does not contain the original word, you'll be asked to tap the parts that relate. This helps create that fill-in-the-blank game:

🖼️ Pick an Image

Selecting an image to accompany each word helps create strong visual associations, making it easier for your partner to remember and recall vocabulary. We have a library of tens of thousands of icons to choose from:

Once your Brew is complete, send it back to your learner to enjoy and savor:

🍵 3. Tasting the Powerful Learning System

The Daily Grind is your daily language learning routine where you'll learn by taking Sips -- individual words and phrases -- brewed by your Barista.

🆕 When you open your first Daily Grind, you'll be introduced to a new word. Take a Sip and keep it flowing:

Later that Sip will come up again, its first repetition! This time, you'll be tested on your memory. 🤔 Take a second, and whether you can remember or not, tap Reveal Meaning:

In Coupling, you self-grade yourself: Tap Try Again if you couldn't recall, or tap Good if you were able to remember it. You can even tap Too Easy if you totally know it and don't feel you need to Sip this word as often.

👍 And it's okay if you didn't remember it! It's all about repetitions and getting through quickly.

The Sip will come up once more this session, now prompting you for the reverse, training both recognition and recall:

Go through the same process. If you were able to remember again, then you've cleared that Sip for the day! Else, you'll go through more repetitions to strengthen your memory.

🏆 Completing your Daily Grind rewards you with stamps, redeemable for Beans to create more Sips. During our grand opening, enjoy free Sips on the house!

⚛️ The Spaced Repetition Life Hack

🔁 Coupling's learning method uses Spaced Repetition System , a proven technique used by polyglots and medical students to maximize memory retention of hundreds or thousands of terms.

Click here to read a highly recommended comic on the matter.

With this system, the more you learn a word, the less you have to review it. And the more you struggle with a word, the system will schedule more repetitions to lock it down.

In the buttons, you saw time intervals like "1 day" or "4 days". This tells you when you'll see the card again. These time intervals exponentially increase if you can continue to remember the word, and they'll slowly decrease if you start to have trouble recalling:

Algorithmically, you'll be scheduled to review a word right as you're about to forget them. It's how the top language learners can reliably memorize and retain thousands of words 🧠

🌲 Mature and Mastered

If a Sip has less than 18 days between repetitions, we call that Sip Learning.

If a Sip has more than 18 days between repetitions, we call that Sip Mature.

At 6 months, we call it Mastered!

➕ 4. Adding More Sips

You can also add any words and phrase you want, independent of a Brew. Head over to the Deck screen, click the ➕ Plus icon in the top right corner, and then you can add any word or phrase you want you or your partner to learn:

After adding a Sip, you can attach additional notes or audio recordings. Just make sure to hit Save on those audio recordings.

💬 5. Join the Community Discord

We're super active on the Discord. There, you can directly provide feedback, feature requests, bug reports. Or email me at kevo@couplingcafe.com

You can even see what I'm actively working on at this moment:

Become a core part of guiding Coupling to be the perfect language learning app for you.

👋 Stop On By the Cafe

Once you get your first Brews and Sips going, you'll be bouncing words back and forth between each other. It's a rewarding process that'll produce lots of fun and laughter.

Make it a habit to do your Daily Grinds, paired with your daily cup of tea or coffee. Take a few Sips per day and see your language skills compound over time. I hope to see you stop on by at the cafe!

title: Language Together Now Available
description: Happy Valentine's Day! Learn a language with your partner today
dc:creator: Coupling
content:encoded:
After a long journey of exploration, countless ups and downs, and development that started in October 2020, I am thrilled to announce a euphoric milestone — not just for myself but hopefully for you too. Coupling, the language learning app designed to deepen the bond between you and your partner, has been reconstructed from the ground up. With a new home at couplingcafe.com, Coupling is now available on App Store and Google Play!

Also stop by to say hi on the Coupling Discord

🍃 What's Been Renovated At Coupling Cafe?

  • 🍵 A Brand New Cafe Theme: You find yourself a traveler in the local cafe of a foreign country. The barista (your partner) waits behind the counter, ready to serve up language brews in a cozy setting. Will you stop by for a drink enough to transform into a language speaking regular?

  • 📚 Personalized Vocabulary Packs: Browse our menu of hundreds of themed vocabulary packs to learn what's relevant to you. Place an order to your personal barista to "brew" these packs specifically for you. This personalized approach ensures you'll be coming back for more

  • 🎨 Artisanal Learning Content: With clearer directions for partners and a little bit of AI juice, creating personalized sentences, vocabulary, and audio recordings has never been easier. Learning material isn't just accurate; it's customized to fit your life, interests, and the unique dialect and vernacular of your partner's region.

  • 🎁 Surprises Await: We're not just faster and smoother; we're filled with surprises that await your discovery. Our updated visual design and seamless interactions are just the beginning.

⛰️ First Sip: The Story Behind Coupling

The idea of Coupling was born out of inspiration during a week-long wilderness trip with my partner, Heidi. We had just escaped heavy wildfire smoke at the top of a remote, unmarked Yosemite mountain pass at 12,000 feet, and battled thirst after our water supply dwindled climbing back out the range (foreshadowing to a drink theme).

As Heidi began teaching me Chinese words to pass the miles, I was like, wait: why had I been trying to learn Chinese on my own when I had the best teacher right beside me who was emotionally invested in my progress?

The idea for the name followed on shortly after, Coupling: symbolizing not just couples but also the melding of language (ling) and connection. Just as couplings are mechanical components that transmit power between two parts, Coupling is the conduit for language and understanding between you and your partner.

I asked around and listened to stories of many couples trying to learn languages from each other, all ending in failure or disaster. I felt I found a problem worth solving. Coupling doesn't aim to just solve language barriers; I want it to deepen understanding, lower cultural walls, and most importantly, make a fun activity that adds another layer to relationships.

📝 Insights Learned From the Webapp Prototype

Big thanks to everyone who tried out the early versions of Coupling and shared their thoughts. It really helped shape the direction today.

Here's what I learned. At first, I thought making things super easy for partners by having a library of ready-made content was the way to go. Then I pulled in the partner too much by pivoting towards live language mini-games. However, I've come to see that Coupling truly comes alive when we enable partners to take an active but asynchronous role.

Now, learners pick what they want to learn, prompting partners to craft content that's personalized and spot-on accurate. This shift sparked a sense of mutual investment. Learners dive in deeper, motivated by their partner's dedicated efforts, while partners are engaged by seeing the positive contributions to the learner's progress.

☕ What's Brewing?

I have so many things coming down the pipeline that I'm excited about. Here's what I have scribbled on my notebook:

  • 💎 Bite-Sized Learning: Add levels, mini-boss challenges, and rewards to make learning like a game

  • 🔨 Custom Vocabulary Packs: Create and personalize your own vocabulary packs from scratch

  • 🎙️ Interactive Mini-Games: Add pronunciation tester and sentence arranging mini-games to help with speaking and grammar

  • 📰 Activity Log: Keep tabs on your partner's learning journey with an easy-to-follow log

  • ❓ Q&A Feature: Ask questions about words, asynchronously

  • 📈 Enhanced Stats and Graphs: Get a dopamine fix seeing lines go up

  • 📙 Dictionary Integrations: Conjugations, tenses, synonyms, antonyms, and frequency usage

  • 🖌️ Cafe Renovations: More animations, theming, and art juice for the cafe

🍵 Give Coupling a Taste Test

I've been using the latest version with Heidi, diving into Cantonese while she picks up on advanced English and the latest slang. I'm at over 850 words and phrases in my deck with 21 hours of learning time, it's coming along!

I want to hear from you. Tell me what you love, what you’re struggling with, any bugs you’ve spotted, or what features you’d like to see. I want to make Coupling work for you. Join the Coupling Discord or email me kevin@learncoupling.com

Try out Coupling on App Store or Google Play and kick off an adventure with your partner where every word brings you closer. Happy Valentine's Day!

Big thank you to Xefjord for support since the beginning and assisting with creating hundreds of vocabulary packs!
